name: warm wishes hot water bottle cover
notes:
materials
- 1 skein of purl soho’s [nigh dk][1], 100% cashmere yarn. each skein of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 199 yards/ 55 grams; approximately 160 total yards required. we used the colors golden ochre, lilac bloom, morning sky, pearl gray, pink pearl, quince blossom, and sugar maple.
- us 6 (4 mm), 32-inch [circular knitting needles][2] for [magic loop][3] (see pattern)
- [stitch markers][4], including one unique
- a 2-quart [hot water bottle][5] for your new cover!

gauge
20 stitches and 32 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch

size
- finished circumference: 16 inches
- finished height: 13½ inches tall from cast-on edge, unrolled

pattern designed and written by purl soho designer, [gianna mueller][6]. see even more of gianna’s work [on her instagram][7]!


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/nigh-dk.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/magic-loop/
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-stitch_markers.html
  [5]: https://www.purlsoho.com/hot-water-bottle.html
  [6]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/
